title: Find Familiar
content:
interact with the environment.

Find Familiar Information

Description: Gain the service of a familiar, a fey spirit that takes an animal form of your choosing: Find Familiar: Spider Summon spider familiar. Its deadly bite can poison enemies. Find Familiar: Raven Summon a raven familiar. It can launch precise attacks. Find Familiar: Frog Summon a frog familiar. Its skin is covered with dizzying toxins. Find Familiar: Cat Summon a cat familiar. Its meow can distract your enemies. Find Familiar: C
